survey_name: Gen Z Digital Banking App Feature Prioritization Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from Gen Z users on their preferences and priorities for features in digital banking apps, to help financial institutions better cater to this demographic.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use your bank's mobile app?
questions.client_notes: Ensure the scale is balanced and covers all possible usage frequencies. Consider randomizing the order of options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use your bank's mobile app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you consider essential? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow for multiple selections and include an 'Other' option to capture unique preferences. Ensure the layout is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital banking features do you consider essential? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the most frustrating aspect of using your current banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended format to allow for detailed responses. Ensure the text box is large enough for thorough feedback.

script.question_text: What is the most frustrating aspect of using your current banking app?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to switch to a bank that offers better digital banking features?
questions.client_notes: Use a balanced scale to measure likelihood accurately. Randomize the order of positive and negative options if possible.

script.question_text: How likely are you to switch to a bank that offers better digital banking features?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in a digital banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended question to capture innovative or unique feature ideas. Ensure the text box is mobile-responsive.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in a digital banking app?
